<mxCell id="2" value="issuer" style="shape=ext;double=0;rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#CCFF99;fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=#999999;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="190" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3" value="verifier" style="shape=ext;double=0;rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FF9999;fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=#999999;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="190" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4" value="holder" style="shape=ext;double=0;rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFFF99;fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=#999999;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="90" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6" value="&nbsp; verifies identity&nbsp;of subject,&nbsp;<br>issues credential to holder" style="endArrow=none;html=1;fontColor=#000000;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.75;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#808080;strokeWidth=4;labelBackgroundColor=#E6E6E6;spacingTop=4;spacing=6;spacingLeft=4;spacingBottom=4;spacingRight=4;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;labelBorderColor=none;comic=0;ignoreEdge=0;fixDash=0;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;endFill=0;" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7" value="&nbsp;presents credential&nbsp;<br>to verifier" style="endArrow=none;html=1;fontColor=#000000;entryX=1;entryY=0.75;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#808080;strokeWidth=4;labelBackgroundColor=#E6E6E6;spacingTop=4;spacing=6;spacingLeft=4;spacingBottom=4;spacingRight=4;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;labelBorderColor=none;comic=0;ignoreEdge=0;fixDash=0;endFill=0;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="8" value="trusts issuer to<br>&nbsp;issue valid credentials&nbsp;" style="endArrow=none;html=1;fontColor=#000000;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#808080;strokeWidth=4;labelBackgroundColor=#E6E6E6;spacingTop=4;spacing=6;spacingLeft=4;spacingBottom=4;spacingRight=4;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;labelBorderColor=none;comic=0;ignoreEdge=0;fixDash=0;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;endFill=0;" y="230" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KBuWo-su-gipEjMjFcoi-8" value="trust list" style="shape=ext;double=0;rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FF9999;fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=#999999;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;" y="200" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
verifies identity of subject,
issues credential to holder
